data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound analyzed in the study?
At what temperature (in K) were the low-temperature intensity data collected for the crystal analysis?
What is the crystal system of the compound according to the study?
Is the space group of the crystal centrosymmetric according to the study?
What method was used for the structure solution as mentioned in the study?
According to the study, does the structure of the compound consist of layers of cerium and chloride atoms?
What is the final R index (R1) for data with I>2σ(I) as reported in the study?
Based on the study, are the water molecules in the compound anchored via the Ce-O bond and hydrogen bonding?
What is the role of NH4Cl in the synthesis of anhydrous LnCl3 according to the study?
data.answer: To react with any OH formed to make H2O and NH3 and leave Cl in the place of OH.

data.question: According to the study, what happens when THF is added to a mixture of compound 1 and MeLi?
data.answer: Gas is immediately evolved which proved to be methane by mass spectroscopy.

data.question: Is the compound [CeCl3(H2O)]n/RLi considered to be anhydrous according to the study?
What does the study suggest about the reagent written as “CeCl3/RLi”?
According to the study, what is the effect of using excess RLi in the synthesis?
data.answer: It may lead to CeCl3/RLi, but LiOH or Li2O may also be present and affect the chemistry.

data.question: Does the study indicate that the presence of lithium salts can affect the reactivity of the “CeCl3/RLi” reagent?
What does the study suggest about the variability of results obtained with the “CeCl3/RLi” reagent?
data.answer: It may be due to variable amounts of lithium salts present depending on how the drying was done.

data.question: According to the study, what could lead to better reproducibility and specificity in reactivity with the “CeCl3/RLi” reagent?
data.answer: Precise control of the amount of LiOH or Li2O present.

data.question: Is the compound [CeCl3(H2O)(THF)]n described in the study as having a layered structure?
What is the role of THF groups in the structure of [CeCl3(H2O)(THF)]n as described in the study?
data.answer: They extend above and below the layers which contain the water molecules.

data.question: According to the study, are the water molecules in [CeCl3(H2O)(THF)]n involved in hydrogen bonding?
What does the study conclude about the effectiveness of the “CeCl3/RLi” reagent?
data.answer: None of the discoveries diminishes the observed effectiveness of this reagent.
